deployedContract.abi
deployedContract

const ContractSource = await hre.ethers.getContractFactory('AVAXAPE')
.exit
await contract.launch()

const ABI = [
const contractAddress = "0xbd13Bb55678f065f894ca31796f356cD57b4D9d1"
const signer = provider.getSigner()
const provider = ethers.provider
deployedContract = await ContractSource.deploy("0x35eb6e7376C74b5FB8C1F6951252E462E1fc3F10", 1648576332)
const deployedContract = await ContractSource.deploy("0x35eb6e7376C74b5FB8C1F6951252E462E1fc3F10", 1648576332)
const deployedContract = await ContractSource.deploy(deployer.address, 1648576332)
await deployedContract.deployTransaction.wait()
const ContractSource = await hre.ethers.getContractFactory('AVAXAPE')
.exit
await contract.launch()
await contract.startUNIX
contract
